title: An Interview with Bill Saunders
creator_credit: Bill Saunders and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Bill Saunders joined the Airforce with his brother when both were called up in 1941. He shares stories from this time, about his training and posting in Europe as a pilot during World War II. In his time, he flew Tigermoths and the Ansons.
